input.sentences: our trip to location was spectacular .
the masquerade was happening all around us .
this old church was by far our favorite attraction .
output.sentences: Italy is beautiful in the summer.
The light shines off the old buildings showcasing their beauty.
There are all sorts of street performers in the summer too.
The weather is warm enough for the clowns to bring out their unicycles.
The old churches look especially beautiful in the summer.
